products.name: Hot Pockets Pepperoni Pizza with Garlic Buttery Seasoned Crust - 2 ct

extendedInfo.detail: Premium pepperoni pizza with reduced fat mozzarella cheese in a seasoned garlic buttery crust.  10 g protein per sandwich. Per 1 Sandwich: 310 calories; 5 g sat fat (25% DV); 830 mg sodium (36% DV); 3 g total sugars; 220 mg calcium (15% DV); 2.5 mg iron (15% DV).  See nutrition information for sat fat and sodium content. Good Source of Protein. Nestle - Good food, good life. Fill up with the good stuff: It's what's on the inside that counts so we have options that are a good source of protein, made with real cheese, and a variety of delicious crusts all baked daily. Enjoy in an easy-to-hold sleeve. Let's Talk: Hotpackes.com, text or call 1-800-350-5016.  Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.  Real satisfaction for real hunger. Ding! Gooey. Easy. Hot. Dispose properly.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Enriched Flour (Wheat Flour, Malted Barley Flour, Niacin, Iron, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Water, Reduced Fat Mozzarella Cheese (Pasteurized Part Skim Milk, Nonfat Milk, Modified Food Starch [Ingredients Not In Regular Mozzarella Cheese], Cultures, Salt, Vitamin A Palmitate, Enzymes), Pepperoni (Pork, Beef, Salt, 2% Or Less Of Spices, Dextrose, Lactic Acid Starter Culture, Oleoresin Of Paprika, Sodium Ascorbate, Flavoring, Dried Garlic, Sodium Nitrite, BHA, BHT, Citric Acid), Tomato Paste, Vegetable Oil (Soybean Oil And/or Canola Oil), 2% Or Less Of Salt, Sugar, Seasoning (Bread Crumb [Bleached Wheat Flour, Dextrose, Yeast, Salt], Dried Garlic, Tomato Powder, Spice, Salt, Dextrose, Dried Onion, Maltodextrin, Citric Acid, Natural Flavor), Modified Food Starch, Fractionated Palm Oil, Yeast, Dough Conditioner Blend (Calcium Sulfate, Salt, L-Cysteine Hydrochloride, Garlic Powder, Tricalcium Phosphate, Enzymes [Wheat]), Soy Lecithin, Dried Garlic, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Natural Flavor, Methylcellulose, Flavor (Natural Garlic Flavor, DATEM, Medium Chain Triglycerides), Dried Onions, Spice, Whey, Maltodextrin, Potassium Chloride, Citric Acid, Soy Flour, Dried Egg Whites.
extendedInfo.directions: Microwave Oven Cooking Instructions for Hot Pockets Brand Sandwiches: Load it: Unwrap sandwich, load it into crisping sleeve, and place on paper plate. Heat it: Cook it in the magical heating machine, A.K.A. the microwave. Cooking time on high: Quantity: 1 sandwich; 1100 watt oven: 1:50 (ovens vary; cooking time may need to be adjusted); Lower Wattage/Compact Microwave: 2:50 (ovens vary; cooking time may need to be adjusted). Quantity: 2 sandwiches; 1100 watt oven: 3:30 (ovens vary; cooking time may need to be adjusted); Lower wattage/compact microwave: For best results, cook one at a time. Enjoy it: Let sit 2 minutes to complete cooking, and enjoy. Air Fryer: Try air frying for an even crispier crunch! Unwrap sandwich and place in bottom of air fryer. Do not use crisping sleeve in air fryer. For 1 sandwich, set air fryer at 360 degrees F for 16 minutes (Directions developed using various sized air fryers; cook times may need to be adjusted). For 2 sandwiches, place separately and set air fryer at 360 degrees F for 18 minutes (Directions developed using various sized air fryers; cook times may need to be adjusted). Carefully remove from air fryer. Conventional Oven: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F, unwrap sandwich and place on baking sheet. Do not use crisping sleeve in oven. Bake for 27 minutes (ovens vary; cooking time may need to be adjusted), then carefully remove from oven. For food safety and quality, read and follow these cooking instructions to ensure product reaches internal temperature of 165 degrees F. Cook thoroughly before eating. Product will be hot! Save your tastebuds and wait for your sandwich to cool.  Keep frozen.
